cast.name: 乔治·坎塔里尼 Giorgio Cantarini

this_title: A.P. Giannini - Bank to the future
introduction: A.P. Giannini - Bank To The Future focuses on the incredible true story of Amadeo Peter Giannini, the man who revolutionized the world of finance by lending money to low-income workers and migrants during the worst economic crises of all times.What does his legacy tell us about the future of finance?
chinese_title: A.P. Giannini - Bank to the future
